Author: Alex3917
Content: How do you choose between being an employee and being an employer without comparing the two?

Author: sosuke
Content: Doctors and lawyers are jobs like any other. These new adverstising based websites are companies. Doctors and lawyers  have some of the largest salaries of any career but starting a successful company is a whole different beast. They shouldn't compare being an employee to being an employer.

Author: aston
Content: Appjet.com's got a great one of these, too (for javascript).

Author: Alex3917
Content: Rule of thumb: If a job has a prestigious title, it's probably because it sucks and no one would do it otherwise.
